TopicTitle: KSP Shorts- building something and watching it fly (or crash) in under 5 minutes

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody! Since career mode vids take forever to record/edit/upload i'm going to do some short vids in between. Basically i'll build whatever I feel like really quick, and launch to see what happens. I'll keep these separate from my career mode thread since they don't overlap, but i'll put all of them in here.

First off, i build Dr. Evil's rocket from Austin powers (not the Big Boy one)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sGxnGaRRiW8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I'll take requests for future episodes, too. Not just movie rockets, i'll try anything as long as it can be done in under a 5 minute video.

A new short! This time it went a bit over 5 minutes, but I did fail a bunch before getting it right...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/liClqMqDjnM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

and now... an SSTO! a simple one: 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UklqVpZIXZY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Today I take Bacon Space Program's beautifully crafted restaurant on wheels and blast it into space!! also i make it into a plane. And it blows up a lot...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ws7FFel0mTo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 GkeAM4ScBbFqQpD11\_
